column9: This drug caused my heart rate to drop to 40 beats a minute.  He took it along with Xalatan. For two years)Doctor said stop taking the Timolol.  No one at the eye doctor caught this because they never took his BP.  It was caught by his regular doctor. Eye doctors need to check you Blood Pressure and heart rate as well as Just Your Eyes.

column1: High Eye Pressure or Glaucoma that May Worsen without Treatment
column2: Jim, 55-64 Male  on Treatment for 1 to 6 months (Patient)
column9: My doctor tried me on this medication. I started having a rapid heart beat and skipping beats. Had a few emergency room visits, costly ones, before it was determined that Timolol caused the heart problems. My blood pressure meds were changed with every ER visit. It cost me tons of money on the Co-Pays. Who knew an eye drop could cause cardiac problems? Now I use Marijuana exclusively, with a prescription, and two puffs three times a day keeps my IOPs at 18 and 20. No Side Effects!
